References: Kapanadze et al. "A recent strong X-ray flaring activity of 1ES 1959+650 with possibly less efficient stochastic acceleration", MNRAS, 461, L26
Kapanadze et al. 2017, "The second strong X-ray flare in 1ES 1959+650", submitted to MNRAS
Instrument: JET-X Wolter I type telescope, EEV CCD2 detector
Observatory: Pennsylvania State University, Brera Astronomical Observatory (OAB) and University of Leicester
